name: 董容辰
objective:
1. Cavity modes
2. Spherical-mirror resonators
3. Nonlinear optics
schedule:
Introduction (1 week)
Gaussian beams (1 week)
Hermite-Gaussian (HG) beams (1 week)
Laguerre-Gaussian (LG) beams (1 week)
Ray confinement (1 week)
Resonance frequencies (1 week)
Degeneracy in spherical resonators (2 weeks)
Midterm exam (1 week)
Nonlinear HG & LG modes (4 weeks)
Nonlinear optical waves in degenerate cavities (4 weeks)
Final exam (1 week)
materials:
Lasers, A. E. Siegman
Laser Electronics, Joseph T. Verdeyen
